author: elfontan
body:
#### PR description:
Backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/48583, meant for the 2025 pp data-taking.

It updates of the scouting event content for the last menu of 2025 pp data-taking (V1.3) to save some lower level calo information, namely the RecHits from HBHE and ECAL. 

[cc: @missirol @Sam-Harper: thanks for the contributions! @silviodonato @patinkaew for scouting; @mtosi @bainbrid as TSG coordinators] 

#### PR validation:
The PR has been prepared starting from CMSSW_15_0_X_2025-07-21-2300:
```
cmsrel CMSSW_15_0_X_2025-07-21-2300
cd CMSSW_15_0_X_2025-07-21-2300/src
cmsenv
git cms-init
git cms-addpkg HLTrigger/special
git cms-addpkg DataFormats/Scouting
scram b && scram b code-checks && scram b code-format && scram b
scram b check-headers
```
New unit tests are introduced to test the validity of the new data formats and are used as part of the validation process:
```
scram b runtests_TestRun3ScoutingDataFormats
scram b runtests
```

**NOTES**:
* A backport to update _DataFormats/Scouting_ unit test after a new 15_0_X release gets built might be needed (https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/48603): [?] @makortel 
* Backport of a sister PR of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/48583 (= https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/48602) is in place: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/48610
* JIRA ticket to update the V1.3 menu: [CMSHLT-3607](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3607)
* JIRA ticket for documentation purposes: [CMSHLT-3603](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3603)
title: [Backport] Adding Calo RecHits to the Scouting Event Content (end of 2025 data-taking)
